dialogue.text: [Saturday]
The day has just begun, and it’s already been wonderful!
Heh, true that, but things are gonna get so much better now.
It’s ramen time, baby! After a performance like that, I think imma need seconds! Nah, imma need thirds!
Just one portion is ok for me, eheheh~
The shop is right around the corner here! Honestly, the hidden away places like this always serve the best... huh-?
Wait... has this place been closed all day? They’ve never been closed on Saturdays before. This is, like, their busiest day of the week!
Ah... what a shame... Perhaps the owner is away for the weekend?
I mean, maybe... but wouldn’t they put up a notice in advance for something like that?
Oh dear, I think EVERY shop on this street is closed right now.
All of them??? Damn, it's never been this dead here before.
Guess it didn’t really matter how much time we were using up earlier... I’m sorry, Sweet...
No need to apologize, Sour. I’m sure there’s plenty of nice places to eat here in the city.
That was the nicest place I could think of that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg. I’d take you to that burger joint I love, but I prefer going on days that Umami’s working there.
Tch, well... There's a decent vendor on Main Street. I just wish our first food date coulda been somewhere nice.
I’m sure it’ll be just as lovely. Shall we go?
Yeah... let's roll.
[Sunday]
I’ve heard the beaches here in Enzync are lovely!
I’m not much of a beach guy, but if you’d like to check one out, I can bring you down to Malic Beach.
It’s right around here, actually! Just pass a few buildings and... -HUH?!
Is something wrong?
Yeah, something’s wrong here... what do you mean the beach is ‘Under Reconstruction’? How do you reconstruct a damn beach?!
The beach looks quite messy right now. Maybe something happened recently that caused all this debris?
I don’t know. Geez, feels like everything’s been out of order this week all of a sudden.
I don’t really know any other good beaches, so... maybe we could head down to Lavender Park instead? We didn’t get to take it all in last time we were there together.
I’d love that! That place has such a special spot in my memory.
I promise we’ll actually get to do one of the dope ideas I had planned this week soon.
[Monday]
Sold out?! This place has never ONCE sold out in all years I’ve been here!
[Tuesday]
Delayed ‘till next week? You serious right now?
[Day... after day... after day.]
ARE YOU FORREAL?!
[The Next Saturday...]
WHAT THE HELL IS GOIN’ ON HERE?! WHY IS EVERYTHING OUT OF WHACK IN THIS CITY?!
I just want to do ONE cool thing with my girlfriend this week! Just one!
Sour, please...
Rgh... I’m sorry, Sweet. This reunion was supposed to be special, then life just felt like spiting us at every corner! It’s ain’t fair!
I know, I know... I just... It hurts seeing you like this.
...especially since you wanted to do all these things for me.
And now you already gotta head back home...
I know, I know, but... Sour. Please listen to me.
...Sweet?
Sour... do you know that person?
Huh? Do I...
Great, just great. Of course you of all people just HAVE to show up. The hell do you want?
...oh, I’m sorry. Am I getting in the way of your street tantrum?
-street tantrum?! What, am I forbidden from being pissed off?
Mister 'I’ve had it easy all my life' finally experiences his first life problem, and now he’s gotta make it everyone else’s issue too, huh?
Rgh-! Why are you here, Tangy?!
I’m walking home, Sour. Trying to mind my own business... going down the main road...
In the city we both live in, you idiot! Tch... I can’t even walk down the street without dealing with you.
Dealing with me-?
You’re unavoidable. No matter what I do or where I go, you follow me around like a goddamn curse on my life.
The hell are you on about?! We avoided each other for years... and now you’re acting like I’ve given you trouble this whole time?
You have.
Everywhere I look... I see your face plastered over everything... with that stupid condescending look you always have.

I want to just ignore you. I wish you would go away forever... but you’re everywhere, and every glimpse of you is just a reminder that only the lucky succeed. You don’t know how goddamn lucky you are...
Ghh-! ...look. I’m sorry, aight? It’s not like I control things like that. That’s just how social media and marketing is. It’s like you said... What do you expect when we live in the same damn city?
And yet despite all the constant attention you get, you STILL get away with how STUPID you act.
Sour, maybe we should-
...and all in front of your new fling too. Making this poor girl have to endure your bullshit... I hate you so much.
Oh naw, you’ve crossed the line, Tangy. You take that back and leave her out of this!
Sour... I...
Sweet... Rgh-! Just... walk home and leave us alone already, Tangy!
...no. In fact, now that you’ve gotten the whole street’s attention, I’ll show you what I’ve been up to all this time since we last talked.
What made you big and famous at the Showroom was all flash. You don’t know how to really make a scene.
